rules.text: Project restores degraded forest lands and meets additionality tests per Tool 01.
Baseline net GHG removals derived from historical land-use data per Tool 02 guidance.
Project emissions include fossil fuel use, biomass burning, and fertilizer application as per Tool 08.
Leakage from activity shifting and market effects addressed using Tool 14 default factors.
Non-permanence buffer determined via Tool 15 risk analysis and recorded in registry accounts.
Permanent sample plots re-measured at least every five years per Tool 16 QA/QC guidance.
Sampling uncertainty kept below 10% at 90% confidence or conservatively adjusted using Tool 12.
Monitoring reports compile geospatial data, emissions sources, and buffer transactions with full audit trail.
